trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] The storage account must be located in the same datacenter as the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] The storage account must be located in the same datacenter as the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: For available datacenters, see the **Regions** menu on the [HDInsight Pricing page](/pricing/details/hdinsight/).
